# Play with Mesh3D
---


    iB = ImageCrop@Rasterize[Style["B", FontSize -> 100, Red]];
    iE = ImageCrop@Rasterize[Style["E", FontSize -> 100, Red]];
    iG = ImageCrop@Rasterize[Style["G", FontSize -> 100, Red]];
    

    meshiB = ImageMesh[ColorNegate[iB]];
    meshiE = ImageMesh[ColorNegate[iE]];
    meshiG = ImageMesh[ColorNegate[iG]];
    mesh3diB = RegionProduct[meshiB, Line[{{0.}, {50.}}]];
    mesh3diE = RegionProduct[meshiE, Line[{{0.}, {50.}}]];
    mesh3diG = RegionProduct[meshiG, Line[{{0.}, {50.}}]];
    

    mB = TransformedRegion[mesh3diB, TranslationTransform[{0, 0, 50}].RotationTransform[90 Degree, {0, 1, 0}, {0, 0, 0}]];
    mE = TransformedRegion[mesh3diE, TranslationTransform[{0, 0, 50}].RotationTransform[270 Degree, {1, 0, 0}, {0, 0, 0}].ScalingTransform[.8 {1, 1, 1}]];
    mG \.00 = TransformedRegion[mesh3diG, RotationTransform[0 Degree, {0, 0, 1}]];
    g3dmB = Graphics3D@mB;
    g3dmE = Graphics3D@mE;
    g3dmG = Graphics3D@mG;
    {Show[g3dmB, g3dmE, g3dmG, ViewPoint -> Top],  Show[g3dmB, g3dmE, g3dmG, ViewPoint -> Front],  Show[g3dmB, g3dmE, g3dmG, ViewPoint -> Left]}

![OutputCell](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HyperGroups/Mathematica/master/YuQue/mathematica/PlayingMathematica/Mesh3D/Mesh3D/resource/Mesh3D_5.jpg)

# Two
---


    r = TransformedRegion[#, RescalingTransform[RegionBounds@#, {{0, 50}, {0, 50}, {0, 50}}]] & /@ {mB, mE, mG};
    

    inter = RegionIntersection @@ r[[1 ;; 2]]

    \!\(\*Graphics3DBox[GraphicsComplex3DBox[CompressedData["1:"], {Hue[0.6, 0.3, 0.85], EdgeForm[Hue[0.6, 0.3, 0.75]], TagBox[Polygon3DBox[{{29, 1, 68}, {68, 1, 63}, {70, 4, 71}, {64, 4, 70}, {71, 4, # Three
---


    inter = RegionIntersection @@ r
